member.name: T:Rss.RssFeed
member.summary: The contents of a RssFeed

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the RssFeed class.

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.#ctor(System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the RssFeed class with a specified encoding.

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the current Object.
member.returns: The Url of the feed

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the specified RSS feed
member.param: The url or filename of the RSS feed
member.returns: The contents of the feed

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.Read(System.Net.HttpWebRequest)
member.summary: Reads the specified RSS feed
member.param: The specified way to connect to the web server
member.returns: The contents of the feed

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.Read(Rss.RssFeed)
member.summary: Reads the specified RSS feed
member.param: The cached version of the feed
member.returns: The current contents of the feed
member.remarks: Will not download the feed if it has not been modified

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.Read(System.Net.HttpWebRequest,Rss.RssFeed)
member.summary: Reads the specified RSS feed
member.param: The specified way to connect to the web server
The cached version of the feed
member.returns: The current contents of the feed
member.remarks: Will not download the feed if it has not been modified

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.Write(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the RSS feed to the specified stream.
member.exception: The Stream cannot be written to.
Feed must contain at least one channel.
Channel must contain at least one item.

member.name: M:Rss.RssFeed.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the RSS feed to the specified file.
member.remarks: The encoding is ISO-8859-1.
member.exception: The filename is empty, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
Access is denied.
The filename is a (null c#, Nothing vb) reference.
The directory to write to is not found.
The filename includes an incorrect or invalid syntax for file name, directory name, or volume label syntax.
The caller does not have the required permission.
member.param: specified file (including path) If the file exists, it will be truncated with the new content.
member.exception: Feed must contain at least one channel.
Channel must contain at least one item.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Channels
member.summary: The channels that are contained in the feed.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Modules
member.summary: The modules that the feed adhears to.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Exceptions
member.summary: A collection of all exceptions encountered during the reading of the feed.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Version
member.summary: The Version of the feed.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.ETag
member.summary: The server generated hash of the feed.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.LastModified
member.summary: The server generated last modfified date and time of the feed.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Cached
member.summary: Indicates this feed has not been changed on the server, and the local copy was returned.

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Url
member.summary: Location of the feed

member.name: P:Rss.RssFeed.Encoding
member.summary: Encoding of the feed

member.summary: Copies the entire RssChannelCollection to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.
member.param: The one-dimensional RssChannel Array that is the destination of the elements copied from RssChannelCollection. The Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
member.exception: array is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
index is less than zero.

array is multidimensional. -or- index is equal to or greater than the length of array.-or-The number of elements in the source RssChannelCollection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.

member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of RssChannel within the entire RssChannelCollection, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: T:Rss.RssChannel
member.summary: Grouping of related content items on a site

member.name: M:Rss.RssChannel.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the RssChannel class.

member.name: M:Rss.RssChannel.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the current Object.
member.returns: The channel's title, description, or "RssChannel" if the title and description are blank.

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Title
member.summary: The name of the channel
member.remarks: Maximum length is 100 characters (For RSS 0.91)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Link
member.summary: URL of the website named in the title
member.remarks: Maximum length is 500 characters (For RSS 0.91)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Description
member.summary: Description of the channel
member.remarks: Maximum length is 500 characters (For RSS 0.91)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Language
member.summary: Language the channel is written in

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Image
member.summary: A link and description for a graphic icon that represent a channel

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Copyright
member.summary: Copyright notice for content in the channel
member.remarks: Maximum length is 100 (For RSS 0.91)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.ManagingEditor
member.summary: The email address of the managing editor of the channel, the person to contact for editorial inquiries

remarks.para: The suggested format for email addresses in RSS elements is

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.WebMaster
member.summary: The email address of the webmaster for the channel

remarks.para: Person to contact if there are technical problems
The suggested format for email addresses in RSS elements is

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Rating
member.summary: The PICS rating for the channel
member.remarks: Maximum length is 500 (For RSS 0.91)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.PubDate
member.summary: The publication date for the content in the channel, expressed as the coordinated universal time (UTC)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.LastBuildDate
member.summary: The date-time the last time the content of the channel changed, expressed as the coordinated universal time (UTC)

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Categories
member.summary: One or more categories the channel belongs to.

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Generator
member.summary: A string indicating the program used to generate the channel

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Docs
member.summary: A URL, points to the documentation for the format used in the RSS file
member.remarks: Maximum length is 500 (For RSS 0.91).

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.TextInput
member.summary: Provides information about an HTTP GET feature, typically for a search or subscription

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.SkipDays
member.summary: Readers should not read the channel during days listed. (UTC)
member.remarks:
Days are listed in the array in the following order:
Monday
Tuesday
Wednesday
Thursday
Friday
Saturday
Sunday
Monday

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.SkipHours
member.summary: Readers should not read the channel during hours listed (UTC)
member.remarks: Represents a time in UTC - 1.

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Cloud
member.summary: Allow processes to register with a cloud to be notified of updates to the channel

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.TimeToLive
member.summary: The number of minutes that a channel can be cached.

member.name: P:Rss.RssChannel.Items
member.summary: All items within the channel

member.name: T:Rss.RssDefault
member.summary: Contains default values and methods for maintaining data consistency

member.name: F:Rss.RssDefault.String
member.summary: Default value for a string in all RSS classes
member.remarks: If an element in the RSS class library has the value of RssDefault.String, consider the element as "not entered", "null", or empty.

member.name: F:Rss.RssDefault.Int
member.summary: Default value for an int in all RSS classes
member.remarks: If an element in the RSS class library has the value of RssDefault.Int, consider the element as "not entered", "null", or empty.

member.name: F:Rss.RssDefault.DateTime
member.summary: Default value for a DateTime in all RSS classes
member.remarks: If an element in the RSS class library has the value of RssDefault.DateTime, consider the element as "not entered", "null", or empty.

member.name: F:Rss.RssDefault.Uri
member.summary: Default value for a Uri in all RSS classes
member.remarks: If an element in the RSS class library has the value of RssDefault.Uri, consider the element as "not entered", "null", or empty.

member.name: M:Rss.RssDefault.Check(System.String)
member.summary: Verifies the string passed is not null
member.returns: RssDefault.String if input is null, otherwise input
member.remarks: Method is used in properties to prevent a null value

member.name: M:Rss.RssDefault.Check(System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies the int passed is greater than or equal to -1
member.returns: RssDefault.Int if int is less than -1, else input
member.remarks: Method is used in properties to prevent values less than -1

member.name: M:Rss.RssDefault.Check(System.Uri)
member.summary: Verifies the Uri passed is not null
member.returns: RssDefault.Uri if input is null, otherwise input
member.remarks: Method is used in all properties to prevent a null value

member.name: T:Rss.DBBool
member.summary: Represents Null, False, and True
member.remarks: Source: Microsoft c# example

member.name: F:Rss.DBBool.Null
member.summary: A DBBool containing 'Null'.
member.remarks: One of three possible DBBool values.

member.name: F:Rss.DBBool.False
member.summary: A DBBool containing 'False'.
member.remarks: One of three possible DBBool values.

member.name: F:Rss.DBBool.True
member.summary: A DBBool containing 'True'.
member.remarks: One of three possible DBBool values.

member.name: F:Rss.DBBool.value
member.summary: Private field that stores –1, 0, 1 for False, Null, True.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Private instance constructor. The value parameter must be –1, 0, or 1.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_Implicit(System.Boolean)~Rss.DBBool
member.summary: Implicit conversion from bool to DBBool. Maps true to DBBool.True and false to DBBool.False.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_Explicit(Rss.DBBool)~System.Boolean
member.summary: Explicit conversion from DBBool to bool.
member.exception: The given DBBool is Null
member.returns: true or false

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_Equality(Rss.DBBool,Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Equality operator.
member.returns: Returns Null if either operand is Null, otherwise returns True or False.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_Inequality(Rss.DBBool,Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Inequality operator.
member.returns: Returns Null if either operand is Null, otherwise returns True or False.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_LogicalNot(Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Logical negation operator.
member.returns: Returns True if the operand is False, Null if the operand is Null, or False if the operand is True.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_BitwiseAnd(Rss.DBBool,Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Logical AND operator.
member.returns: Returns False if either operand is False, otherwise Null if either operand is Null, otherwise True.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_BitwiseOr(Rss.DBBool,Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Logical OR operator.
member.returns: Returns True if either operand is True, otherwise Null if either operand is Null, otherwise False.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_True(Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Definitely true operator.
member.returns: Returns true if the operand is True, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.op_False(Rss.DBBool)
member.summary: Definitely false operator.
member.returns: Returns true if the operand is False, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Rss.DBBool.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether two DBBool instances are equal.

member.name: T:Rss.RssBlogChannel
member.summary: A RSS module that adds elements at the channel level that are common to weblogs.

member.name: M:Rss.RssBlogChannel.#ctor(System.Uri,System.Uri,System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the
member.param: The URL of an OPML file containing the blogroll for the site.
The URL of an OPML file containing the author's RSS subscriptions.
The URL of a weblog that the author of the weblog is promoting per Mark Pilgrim's description. "http://diveintomark.org/archives/2002/09/17.html#blink_and_youll_miss_it"

The URL of a changes.xml file. When the feed that contains this element updates, it pings a server that updates this file. The presence of this element says to aggregators that they only have to read the changes file to see if this feed has updated. If several feeds point to the same changes file, the aggregator has to do less polling, resulting in better use of server bandwidth, and the Internet as a whole; and resulting in faster scans. Everyone wins. For more technical information, see the howto on the XML-RPC site. "http://www.xmlrpc.com/weblogsComForRss"

member.name: T:Rss.RssWriter
member.summary: Writes an RSS XML file.
member.remarks: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way of generating streams or files containing RSS XML data that conforms to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 and the Namespaces in XML recommendations.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the RssWriter class using the specified Stream and Encoding.
member.exception: The encoding is not supported or the stream cannot be written to.
member.param: The encoding to use. If encoding is (null c#, Nothing vb) it writes out the stream as UTF-8.

member.name: M:Rss.RssWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the RssWriter class using the specified Stream.
member.remarks: The encoding is ISO-8859-1.
member.exception: The Stream cannot be written to.

Access is denied.
The filename is a (null c#, Nothing vb) reference.
The directory to write to is not found.
The filename includes an incorrect or invalid syntax for file name, directory name, or volume label syntax.
The caller does not have the required permission.
member.param: specified file (including path) If the file exists, it will be truncated with the new content.

member.param: The one-dimensional RssCategory Array that is the destination of the elements copied from RssCategoryCollection. The Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
member.exception: array is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
index is less than zero.

array is multidimensional. -or- index is equal to or greater than the length of array.-or-The number of elements in the source RssCategoryCollection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.

member.name: M:Rss.RssCategoryCollection.IndexOf(Rss.RssCategory)
member.summary: Searches for the specified RssCategory and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire RssCategoryCollection.
member.param: The RssCategory to locate in the RssCategoryCollection.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of RssCategory within the entire RssCategoryCollection, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Rss.RssCategoryCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Rss.RssCategory)
member.summary: Inserts an category into this collection at a specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the collection at which to insert the category.
The category to insert into this collection.

member.name: M:Rss.RssCategoryCollection.Remove(Rss.RssCategory)
member.summary: Removes a specified category from this collection.

member.name: P:Rss.RssCategoryCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets or sets the category at a specified index.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the class.
member.param: The index of the collection to access.
member.value: A category at each valid index.
member.remarks: This method is an indexer that can be used to access the collection.
member.exception: index is not a valid index.

member.name: T:Rss.RssCreativeCommons
member.summary: A RSS module that adds elements at the channel or item level that specifies which Creative Commons license applies.

member.name: M:Rss.RssCreativeCommons.#ctor(System.Uri,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the
member.param: If present as a sub-element of channel, indicates that the content of the RSS file is available under a license, indicated by a URL, which is the value of the license element. A list of some licenses that may be used in this context is on the Creative Commons website on this page, however the license element may point to licenses not authored by Creative Commons. You may also use the license element as a sub-element of item. When used this way it applies only to the content of that item. If an item has a license, and the channel does too, the license on the item applies, i.e. the inner license overrides the outer one. Multiple license elements are allowed, in either context, indicating that the content is available under multiple licenses. "http://www.creativecommons.org/licenses/"
If present as a sub-element of channel then true, otherwise false

member.name: T:Rss.RssItem

member.name: P:Rss.RssItem.PubDate
